string-array.name: legal_news_headlines
string-array.item: üì¢ Supreme Court rules on digital privacy rights for citizens.
üì¢ New Consumer Protection Act amendments take effect from next month.
üì¢ Government launches free legal aid portal for women and children.
üì¢ Delhi High Court issues guidelines for rental property disputes.
üì¢ New cybercrime helpline number launched nationwide.
üì¢ Employment law: Minimum wage revised in 5 states.
üì¢ Online RTI filing now available for all government departments.
üì¢ Supreme Court clarifies rights during police arrest procedures.
üì¢ Legal notice templates added in Nyay Mitra app for instant use.
üì¢ Court rules on fast-track procedure for consumer complaints.
üì¢ New data privacy regulations for mobile apps in India.
üì¢ Child protection laws updated under POCSO Act.
üì¢ Motor Vehicle Act: New fines and traffic rules published.
üì¢ AI-driven legal chat feature added to Nyay Mitra.
üì¢ Guidelines issued for digital signatures on legal documents.
üì¢ High Court allows online submission of tenancy disputes.
üì¢ Health & Medical Law: Hospitals must share patient records on request.
üì¢ Supreme Court upholds right to appeal for cyber harassment victims.
üì¢ Free workshops on understanding legal rights available in your city.
üì¢ Nyay Mitra app now supports multilingual document translation.

string-array.name: faq_questions
string-array.item: What is Nyay Mitra?
How does the document scanning work?
What languages does Nyay Mitra support?
Is the AI chat like talking to a real lawyer?
Can Nyay Mitra draft legal documents for me?
How accurate is the legal information?
Is my data safe and private?
Do I need an internet connection?
How much does Nyay Mitra cost?
How do I use the Legal Dictionary?
Can I upload documents from my phone gallery?
What kind of legal documents can I scan?
Does the AI understand complex legal terms?
Can Nyay Mitra help me find a real lawyer?
How often is the legal information updated?
What if the app gives wrong advice?
How do I update my profile?
Can I change the app\'s theme?
How do I delete my account?
Who can I contact for help?

string-array.name: faq_answers
string-array.item: Nyay Mitra is a mobile app that uses AI to help you understand legal documents, your rights, and get basic legal assistance in simple language.
Just take a photo of the document using the app\'s camera feature (in the AI Assistant tab). The app uses technology to read the text and explains it to you.
Nyay Mitra aims to support multiple regional Indian languages. You can select your preferred language in Settings.
No, the AI provides information and explains concepts based on legal data. It\'s a helpful guide, but not a substitute for advice from a qualified human lawyer for complex cases.
The AI can help you draft basic replies or complaints based on your situation, but it cannot create complex legal documents like contracts or wills.
The AI uses reliable legal databases, but laws can change. Always double-check critical information with official sources or a lawyer. The app provides information, not legal advice.
Yes, we take privacy seriously. Your scanned documents and chats are processed securely. Please review our Privacy Policy in Settings for details.
Yes, an internet connection is needed for the AI chat, document analysis, and fetching updated information.
Currently, Nyay Mitra offers basic features for free. Advanced features might be introduced later.
Go to the Dictionary tab. You can browse common legal terms or search for specific words to get simple explanations.
Yes, in the AI Assistant tab, besides using the camera, you can choose to upload an image of a document from your phone\'s gallery.
You can scan notices, letters, FIR copies, agreements, etc. The app works best with clear, printed text.
Yes, the AI is trained to understand and explain many legal terms in simple words.
The app currently focuses on providing information. The "Connect" section might help you find legal aid resources in the future.
We strive to keep the information up-to-date, but legal changes happen. Use the app as a starting point, not the final word.
Nyay Mitra provides information for educational purposes. It cannot be held responsible for actions taken based solely on its suggestions. Consult a lawyer for critical matters.
Click the menu icon (three lines), select your profile, then choose "Update Profile" to change details like gender, age, etc.
Yes! Go to the main Profile screen (via the side menu), select "Theme", and choose between Light, Dark, or System Default.
In the main Profile screen, select "Settings". You will find an option to request account deletion there. Please note this is usually irreversible.
Go to the main Profile screen and select "Help". You\'ll find troubleshooting tips and contact information for support.

resources.string: Welcome to Nyay Mitra! Sign up or log in. Use the bottom tabs to navigate: Home, Chat (Laws info), Connect, Dictionary, and AI Assistant (chat & scan). Use the side menu (top-left) for profile & settings.

Go to the AI Assistant tab. Tap the camera icon. Grant camera permission if asked. Point your camera at the document and tap \'Scan Text\'. The app will read the text. You can then ask the AI to explain or summarize it. You can also upload images from your gallery. Ensure good lighting and clear text.
Tap the Dictionary tab. Choose \'For Lawyers\' or \'For Clients\' to see relevant legal terms explained simply. Use the search bar (if available) to find specific terms quickly.
Go to the AI Assistant tab. Type your legal question in the message box and tap send. The AI will provide information. Remember, this is informational, not legal advice from a human lawyer.

Nyay Mitra helps you understand fundamental rights (like equality, free speech) and consumer rights. Use the Chat (Laws) or AI Assistant for specific questions. For detailed info, check reliable government sources.
Open the side menu (top-left icon), tap your profile. Select \'Update Profile\' to change personal details. Select \'Settings\' for language, privacy, 2FA, or account deletion.
We value your privacy. Your data is handled securely. You can review our full Privacy Policy in the Settings section. Account deletion permanently removes your data as per policy.

App Crash/Slow: Ensure good internet connection. Restart the app. Check for app updates in the Play Store. Clear app cache via phone settings if needed.
Scan Fails: Ensure clear document, good lighting, steady hand. Try again.
AI Response Slow/Error: Check internet. Wait a moment and retry.
If you need further help, please email us at: support@nyaymitra.example.com (replace with actual email). Provide details about your issue.
Requires verification code when logging in
This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be removed.

Hindi
